skill.name: Phantom Slash
skill.description: Unleashes a swift, shadow-infused slash that deals high damage and reduces enemy visibility.

skill.name: Thunderstrike
skill.description: Summons a powerful lightning strike that stuns enemies for 3 seconds.

skill.name: Flame Surge
skill.description: Engulfs the blade in flames, increasing attack power and burning enemies over time.

skill.name: Glacial Spike
skill.description: Launches a shard of ice that slows and freezes enemies on impact.

skill.name: Draconic Lunge
skill.description: A powerful thrust attack that pierces through multiple enemies and deals extra damage to dragons.
